Summary: Circular object seen twice in 24-hour period by total of three witnesses.
divs: sighting detailssummary: this case involves two sightings of the same\similar object in a 24-hour period. first sighting occurred at 0230hrs 19 jun by two minor teenaged females. they were in the pool, heard a loud ���engine��� noise���looked up and saw a circular object about 9-10��� in diameter with three lights on the bottom in equilateral positioning. the lights glowed from red to yellow and there was a green aura or haze around the outside. it was estimated at approximately 100��� agl headed 360 degrees at about 50mph. they were frightened and quickly climbed out of the pool and ran into the house so hastily that one of them slipped and fell and scraped her knee. the parents were asleep, so they did an internet search and located contact information for mufon. the next morning, they told one of the witness' mother. at 2330hrs that night, they saw the same object at a much higher flight level (1500��� agl) headed 240 degrees. they ran inside, alerted the one's mother; and she came outside in time to see it disappearing over the trees south-west of their position. the mother's description was very similar although she admits she only saw it briefly and much further away. geographic survey of the area includes mild rolling hills, farm land, woods, pasture; affording low levels of ground light pollution after dark. no electromagnetic anomalies were experienced in the residence, although the witness claims that their power goes out frequently due to their rural setting. no physical trace evidence was found, and no claim of injuries or physiological affect was reported. radiation readings in the front yard were .08 micro-sieverts. back yard was slightly higher reading .12-.14 msi, but that was taken over their landscaped brook (near the tree line) and is not significant. general photos of the location were taken to show relation of house, swimming pool and tree line.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Circleville
There were no other sightings in Circleville on or around June 19th 2010
